title.rendered: ZJXD Earphones In Ear Headphones Wired Earbuds Noise Isolating Headset With Microphone remote sound control Compatible…

content.rendered:
Size Name:2 packs (white and black)

Colour Name:2Pack Headphones
3.5MM Premium In-Ear Wired Earphones With Remote & Mic Compatible with iPhone , Samsung earphones, Huawei headphones, HTC, MP3 Players and More Both earphones For IOS And Android Earbuds

Choose ZJXD Earphones
Sports, Music, Life Acoustically engineered to supply distinctive frequency response for an enhanced listening expertise.
Enjoy richer, extra detailed sound out of your smartphones, tablets, and audio gadgets. Sweat proof, transportable and light-weight headset can keep in your ears comfortably.
Multifunction Earbuds with Mic and remote quantity control on your all IOS Devices. Allowing you to control the amount, reply or finish calls, control the playback of music and video with click on of button and with out taking your telephone out.
Noise Isolating Designed to not solely present prime quality sound, but additionally suits snugly into your ears. It creates a greater sound isolation and minimizes exterior sound interference. Features Music Playback | Answer/End Calls | Forward/Backward | Play/Pause all options on a Single Button
Headphones Earphones Compatible with all 3.5mm jacks Phone Models:
Headphones Compatible with samsung headphones Huawei earphones iPhone 6S, 6S Plus, 6, 6 Plus, 5S, 5C, 5, 4S, 4.
Warranty: ZJXD If you aren’t glad we offers you a full refund till you might be glad,180 days guarantee.

Make positive this suits by getting into your mannequin quantity.
High-definition Sound Quality Earphones:A brand new and prime quality pair of In-ear Earphones Wired Headphones supplies you with highly effective enhanced bass and wealthy musical particulars for iPhone samsung MP3 Players and extra.
Stylish and Practical Design:Ergonomic In-ear Earphones Wired Headphones design make these earphones match comfortably and keep put in ears whilst you’re operating, jogging, weight lifting, strolling and health club coaching.
SECURE & COMFORTABLE FIT:Just plug and play. With the build-in microphone, you’ll be able to simply reply cell phone calls and modify the amount via the button.No must take out your telephone any extra.Comfortable In-ear Earphones Earbuds design can scale back surrounding noises,excellent for touring or day by day makes use of.
Wide Compatibility:In-ear Earphones Wired Headphones ,Standard 3.5mm jack,Compatible with iPhone 6 6S Plus SE 5S 5C 4S Pad Pod Samsung, HUAWEI Android Smartphones,tablets,MP3/MP4 Player,Portable Music Player,and different fashionable electronics.
ZJXD In-Ear Earphones Wired Headphones Light and Portable: Ideal for taking bus, operating, climbing and different events, get pleasure from fantastic music wherever.
